definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
Friendship Store, PRC state-run store originally intended for foreigners, diplomats etc, specializing in selling imported Western goods and quality Chinese crafts

sentences.english: He transacts business with a large number of stores.
sentences.chinese: 他與很多商店進行交易。

sentences.english: The local store has started selling baguettes and Belgian beers.
sentences.chinese: 當地的商店已經開始出售法國棍式麪包和比利時啤酒。

sentences.english: Shop windows were shattered. Cars were smashed.
sentences.chinese: 商店玻璃破碎，汽車被砸毀，大量傷者躺在街頭。

sentences.english: He bought her a gift at the duty-free shop.
sentences.chinese: 他在免稅商店裏給她買了份禮物。

sentences.english: Come and look round our shop without commitment to buy anything.
sentences.chinese: 請隨時來我們商店轉轉，不一定非要買東西。

sentences.english: I was done out of $20 in the shop this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上我在商店裏被騙走了20美元。

sentences.english: She has an account at that store.
This outsider was fleeced when he was shopping in a local shop.
sentences.chinese: 這個外地人在當地的一家商店購物時挨宰了。

sentences.english: Ji rummages for fake or substandard goods in shops.
sentences.chinese: 紀萬昌在商店裏搜尋假商品或不合格的商品。

sentences.english: Before the store opened, countered the prisoner.
sentences.chinese: 在商店開門之前，犯人應道。

sentences.english: I bought the car from the store for cash.
sentences.chinese: 我用現金從這家商店買下這輛汽車。

sentences.english: It is unclear how the stores procure the Apple merchandise.
sentences.chinese: 目前還不清楚這些商店是如何獲得蘋果的商品。

sentences.english: Billions of apps have been downloaded from Apple 's ( AAPL - news - people ) App Store alone.
sentences.chinese: 已有數以億計的應用從蘋果的應用程序商店中被下載。

sentences.english: He mortgaged his house in order to start a business.
sentences.chinese: 他將房子作抵押借款以開辦一家商店。

sentences.english: I buy this pen from Huaxing Store.
sentences.chinese: 我從華興商店買的這支鋼筆。

sentences.english: There’re quite a few shops and galleries near your hotel.
sentences.chinese: 在你住的飯店附近有幾家商店和藝術館。

definition: supermarket/abbr. for 超級市場|超级市场/CL:家[jia1]
shopping mall/shopping center/department store/emporium/CL:家[jia1]/the business world
see 商城縣|商城县[Shang1 cheng2 xian4]
